allow: Bash(powershell -Command "Get-Process -Name ''uvicorn'',''python'' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Where-Object { $_CommandLine -like ''*uvicorn*'' -or $_CommandLine -like ''*app.main*'' } | Stop-Process -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Write-Host ''Done''")
Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/18/bin/psql.exe" -U postgres -h localhost -d postgres -c "ALTER USER postgres WITH PASSWORD ''postgres'';")
Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/18/bin/psql.exe" -U postgres -h localhost -d postgres -c "\\l carrerlog")
Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/18/bin/psql.exe" -U postgres -h localhost -d postgres -c "CREATE DATABASE carrerlog;")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/18/bin/psql.exe" -U postgres -h localhost -d carrerlog -c "SELECT ''users'' as table_name, COUNT\(*\) as count FROM users UNION ALL SELECT ''problems'', COUNT\(*\) FROM problems UNION ALL SELECT ''experiences'', COUNT\(*\) FROM experiences UNION ALL SELECT ''certifications'', COUNT\(*\) FROM certifications UNION ALL SELECT ''interview_questions'', COUNT\(*\) FROM interview_questions UNION ALL SELECT ''learnings'', COUNT\(*\) FROM learnings ORDER BY table_name;")
Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/18/bin/psql.exe" -U postgres -h localhost -d carrerlog -c "SELECT email FROM users LIMIT 1;")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/18/bin/psql.exe" -U postgres -h localhost -d carrerlog -c "
SELECT 
    ''Database'' as item,
    ''carrerlog'' as name,
    current_database\(\) as current_db;
SELECT ''PostgreSQL Version'' as info, version\(\);
")
